item.title: Ensuring Resiliency: High Availability and Disaster Recovery Strategies
item.description: High Availability (HA) and Disaster Recovery (DR) are critical strategies in cloud computing to ensure services are continuously available and resilient against failures. Designing HA & DR Most of the services can be differentiated as compute and storage; these are the two key components when building resilient software architectures. Here is a generic diagram for HA and DR. HA Key Components Auto-Scaling: Adjusts the number of instances based on traffic demands.
